sub_title: Senior Rule of Law, Security and Justice Reform/Governance Expert
summary: Dedicated lawyer with 30 years overall professional experience as ass. professor of law at the University of Amsterdam, lecturer-researcher international public law, programme manager and strategic advisor for the Police Academy of the Netherlands and various EU and UN organisations. Broad expertise with police and judicial training as well as international human rights, governance and justice reform programmes, Linking academic knowledge of international public law, rule of law, good governance, peace and justice concepts with hands-on experience in development and implementation of a range of international support and reform missions, projects and programmes.
